Pre-Game Insights: The Heat are 10-6 in home games.
The Jazz are 5-13 on the road.
The Heat average 111.4 points per game, 8.4 fewer points than the 119.8 the Jazz allow.
The Jazz are shooting 45.8% from the field, 0.5% lower than the 46.3% the Heat's opponents have shot this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bam Adebayo is averaging 16.5 points, 9.8 rebounds and 4.8 assists for the Heat.
Lauri Markkanen is averaging 19.5 points and 6.4 rebounds for the Jazz.
The Heat are 5-5 in their last 10 games, averaging 109.6 points, 42.5 rebounds, 24.7 assists, 8.3 steals and 3.3 blocks per game while shooting 47.3% from the field.
The Jazz are 2-8 in their last 10 games, averaging 112.9 points, 44.1 rebounds, 25.2 assists, 6.6 steals and 5.2 blocks per game while shooting 46.2% from the field.
Others: The Heat have the following injuries: Dru Smith: out for season (achilles), Josh Richardson: day to day (heel).
The Jazz have the following injuries: John Collins: day to day (hip), Taylor Hendricks: out for season (fibula).
